scripts.build: npm run build:start && cp -r Pages build_folder && cp -r Styles build_folder && cp -r Scripts build_folder && cp -r Videos build_folder && npm run pre:build && npm run video:compress && cp -r compressed_videos build_folder/compressed_videos && rm -r compressed_videos
scripts.pre:build: cp index.html build_folder && cp Script.js build_folder && cp -r PHP build_folder
scripts.video:compress: mkdir -p compressed_videos && for file in videos/*; do ffmpeg -i "$file" -vcodec libx264 -crf 28 -preset fast -acodec aac "compressed_videos/$(basename \"$file\" | sed 's/\.[^.]*$/.mp4/')"; done
